div.style: font-size: 1.1em; background-color: #ededed; padding: 1em; border: 1px solid #ccc; margin-bottom: 20px;
div.p: EXTENDED SCHOOL CLOSURE: Alameda County public K-12 districts have moved to distance learning for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year to slow the spread of novel coronavirus (COVID-19) to the maximum extent. View press release.

p.br: District closure dates listed below are tentative, and only indicate dates when students will not receive in-classroom instruction. School districts continue to monitor and assess the fluid situation. Re-opening dates could be subject to change.

h3.span: Tentative district closure dates: March 16 - end of school year
Tentative district closure dates: March 16 - end of school year

hr.p:
(510) 558-3750
1200 Solano Ave., Albany, CA 94706 (District address)
819 Bancroft Ave., Berkeley, CA 94710 (Administration offices)
